description: Xóa thu tiền và insert vào bảng DEL
body:
DECLARE @ORCTDocEntry INT = $CURSOR$
INSERT INTO dbo.[@FPTORCT_DEL]
        (
         DocEntry
       , DocNum
       , Period
       , Instance
       , Series
       , Handwrtten
       , Canceled
       , Object
       , LogInst
       , UserSign
       , Transfered
       , Status
       , CreateDate
       , CreateTime
       , UpdateDate
       , UpdateTime
       , DataSource
       , U_ShpCod
       , U_CrdCod
       , U_EplCod
       , U_CrDate
       , U_AcDate
       , U_TypeOb
       , U_PerPay
       , U_Desc
       , U_TMoney
       , U_AcCash
       , U_BankTs
       , U_Acbank
       , U_DateTs
       , U_AcTran
       , U_RefNTr
       , U_MoTran
       , U_AcVoch
       , U_DocSO
       , U_MoCash
       , U_MoVoCh
       , U_MoCCad
       , U_DocTotal
       , U_TMonBi
       , U_MapB1
       , U_Status
       , U_CName
       , U_IPAdd
       , U_CrDoc
       , U_DoTotal
       , U_APIErr
       , U_DocB1
       , U_DocDown
       , U_DocAR
       , U_CTLKCode
       , U_CTLKName
       , U_AccNum
       , U_AccName
       , U_NumVch
       , U_NaVoch
       , U_EDate
       , CardType
       , U_TypCre
       , U_Acount
       , U_NumCre
       , U_DocEntryORCT
       , U_DocSO_New
       , U_loaiCT
       , IS_VC_CRM
       , U_CRMCode
       , U_DocReturn
       , U_DocGRPO
        )
SELECT
	DocEntry
       , DocNum
       , Period
       , Instance
       , Series
       , Handwrtten
       , Canceled
       , Object
       , LogInst
       , UserSign
       , Transfered
       , Status
       , CreateDate
       , CreateTime
       , UpdateDate
       , UpdateTime
       , DataSource
       , U_ShpCod
       , U_CrdCod
       , U_EplCod
       , U_CrDate
       , U_AcDate
       , U_TypeOb
       , U_PerPay
       , U_Desc
       , U_TMoney
       , U_AcCash
       , U_BankTs
       , U_Acbank
       , U_DateTs
       , U_AcTran
       , U_RefNTr
       , U_MoTran
       , U_AcVoch
       , U_DocSO
       , U_MoCash
       , U_MoVoCh
       , U_MoCCad
       , U_DocTotal
       , U_TMonBi
       , U_MapB1
       , U_Status
       , U_CName
       , U_IPAdd
       , U_CrDoc
       , U_DoTotal
       , U_APIErr
       , U_DocB1
       , U_DocDown
       , U_DocAR
       , U_CTLKCode
       , U_CTLKName
       , U_AccNum
       , U_AccName
       , U_NumVch
       , U_NaVoch
       , U_EDate
       , CardType
       , U_TypCre
       , U_Acount
       , U_NumCre
       , U_DocEntryORCT
       , U_DocSO_New
       , U_loaiCT
       , IS_VC_CRM
       , U_CRMCode
       , U_DocReturn
       , U_DocGRPO
FROM 
	dbo.[@FPTORCT] (NOLOCK) 
WHERE 
	DocEntry = @ORCTDocEntry

DELETE FROM dbo.[@FPTORCT] WHERE DocEntry = @ORCTDocEntry
